main.name: Yogesh Singh Malik
main.occupation: The ReactJS Frontend Developer you’ve been looking for
main.description: Bringing ideas to life with performant, scalable web apps with React.
main.bio: I'm Yogesh, fondly known as faujiBryant, a React.js Developer based in Janakpuri, New Delhi. My formative years were shaped by my father's Army service, instilling in me discipline, commitment, and adaptability. I studied at Army Public Schools in Udhampur, Dhaula Kuan, and Delhi Cantt. before earning my B.E. in Information Technology from the prestigious Army Institute of Technology, Pune. I have worked with Trendsetters, Vaionex APAC, Indian Oil Corporation Ltd., and Tripjack, specializing in React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Redux, and UI optimization. At Tripjack, I enhanced hotel and travel dashboards, improving performance and user experience.  I have also represented Pune District Basketball team and South West Delhi teams in senior-level competitions for Basketball, Netball, and Korfball, and have actively volunteered for social causes too. Being a sportsman, I understand the value of team-spirit and is never discouraged by failure but is always eager to learn more every day. I thrive on teamwork, resilience, and continuous learning. I’m looking for a role that aligns with my expertise, offers growth, and values impact—open to both full-time and freelance opportunities. Let’s connect to explore how my skills can elevate your team. Together, we’ll achieve remarkable results.

work.company: Tripjack Pvt. Ltd. (via Supersourcing Pvt. Ltd.)
work.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
work.description: During this tenure, I maintained Tripjack’s Hotels and Pluto dashboard applications, enhancing performance and usability using React, LESS, and other modern web technologies. Integrated Google Analytics for key metric tracking, optimized workflows with Agile methodologies (Jira, GitHub), and proactively resolved critical issues to improve application stability and user experience.

work.company: Indian Oil Corporation Ltd. (via Maxworth Electronics Pvt. Ltd.)
work.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
work.description: During this tenure, I developed iSmart web portal for Indian Oil Corporation Ltd's senior officers for reports and analytics using React, Tailwind CSS and Various libraries and other techs like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Material UI, Git, VS Code, and gained practical insights into crafting applications and maintenance of the website.

work.title: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
work.description: During this tenure, I Developed full-stack web applications using Next.JS, React, Tailwind CSS and Notion, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Redux, Material UI, Tailwind CSS, Git, VS Code, Google Firebase Firestore Database, Firebase Storage, Firebase hosting and gained practical insights into crafting applications and maintenance of the website.

work.title: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
work.description: During this tenure, I polished my frontend and backend development skills, including React.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Redux, Material UI, Bootstrap, Enzyme, Jest, Git, SQL, Tableau, Photoshop, VS Code, Google Firebase Firestore Database, Firebase Storage, Firebase hosting and gained practical insights into crafting applications and maintenance of the website. If you know of any job openings in your company or network that may be a good fit for me, please let me know.
